thread.title: Lord Snowdon, Princess Margaret's former husband, dies aged 86
thread.title_full: Lord Snowdon, Princess Margaret's former husband, dies aged 86

author: Telegraph Reporters
title: Lord Snowdon, Princess Margaret's former husband, dies aged 86
text:
Lord Snowdon, Princess Margaret's former husband, dies aged 86 Lord Snowdon died peacefully at his home Credit: William Conran/PA 
L ord Snowdon, the former husband of Princess Margaret, has died aged 86. 
He passed peacefully at his home on Friday, a family spokesman said. 
More follows Princess Margaret and Lord Snowdon waving to the crowds on the balcony of Buckingham Palace after their wedding ceremony at Westminster Abbey Credit: PA
